## IPackageManager.unpack() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

unpacks packed envelope to basic protocol message and returns media type of the envelope

**Signature:**

```typescript
unpack(envelope: Uint8Array): Promise<{
        unpackedMessage: BasicMessage;
        unpackedMediaType: MediaType;
    }>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  envelope | Uint8Array | bytes envelope |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;{ unpackedMessage: [BasicMessage](./js-sdk.basicmessage.md); unpackedMediaType: [MediaType](./js-sdk.protocol_constants.mediatype.md); }&gt;

`Promise<{ unpackedMessage: BasicMessage; unpackedMediaType: MediaType }`
